name: YouTube - Better Player Style (ARC)
description:
When you hate if someone force you to use new player and u dont like it.

Check blue or green color for my player:
https://userstyles.org/styles/122094/youtube-better-player-color-2016-arc

Check my awesome youtube theme:
https://userstyles.org/styles/123887/youtube-better-full-theme-2016-arc
---------------------------------------
Customize your player: 
(all options on screenshot)
additional_info: Version 1.05 (04/2017) -fixed "normal" and "to the left" bug on full screen Version 1.05 (03/2017) -new bottom mode! -fixed colors -improved positions -better player in fullscreen Version 1.04 Update 2 (11/2016) -subtitle fix Version 1.04 (06/2016) -fixed "normal" and "to the left" progress bar mode -visual improvements Version 1.03 Update 2 (03/2016) -fixed fullscreen progress bar Version 1.03 Update 1 (02/2016) - little fix Version 1.03 (02/2016) - new theme dark grey - new progress bar "visual full" that mode isn't glitchy on hover like real full Version 1.02 (01/2016) - select progress bar styles - full progress bar (beta) - progress bar to the left - default progress bar improvements Version 1.01 (12/2015) - customizable - better subtitles position - support for 3 browsers - three themes Version 1.00 (12/2015) - fixed progress bar flickering on fullscreen - fixed progress bar on hover - blocked progress bar resizing - autohide
